items.question: How does Nextmotion Revolution work?
items.answer: Nextmotion Revolution is a robotic arm equipped with a smartphone that automatically captures standardized photos and videos. The device maintains constant parameters (light, distance, angle) to ensure perfectly comparable results.

items.question: What's the difference between Nextmotion Revolution and the Capture app?
items.answer: The Capture app is software that manually guides standardized photo capture with a smartphone. Nextmotion Revolution is a physical device that fully automates this process with a robotic arm, ensuring perfect standardization without human intervention.

items.question: Can I use Nextmotion Revolution for different types of treatments?
items.answer: Yes, Nextmotion Revolution is designed to document all types of aesthetic treatments: injections, lasers, surgery, skin care, etc. The device has predefined protocols for different body areas and treatment types.

items.question: How do patients react to Nextmotion Revolution?
items.answer: Patients are typically impressed by the technology and appreciate the professionalism it demonstrates. The dynamic before/after videos help build their confidence in the results and better understand the benefits of proposed treatments.

items.question: Is Nextmotion Revolution difficult to use?
items.answer: No, Nextmotion Revolution is designed to be user-friendly. After a short training, your team will be able to easily set up the device and initiate captures. The process is largely automated to minimize errors and time required.
